name: Space Pistachio
description:
SPACE PISTACHO

Space Pistacho is a Player vs Player Action Platformer Game. 

One player will control the Yellow Poop Monster from outer space. The other one will control the Red Naked Alien. Both are trying to get as much yellow diamonds as they can to feed their families! They are good fathers :) 

First player to obtain 100 points wins 

----------------------------------------------------

Controls:

Player 1:

  • WASD to Move
  • F to Shoot
  • G to Poop

Player 2:

  • Arrow Keys to Move
  • 0 to Shoot
  • 2 to Pee

----------------------------------------------------

Credits

  • Game Design and Level Design: Allan Novell
  • Programming and Game Design: Adrian Novell
  • Art: No one
  • Music and SFX: ???
